name: Pro Basketball Manager 2019
description: Take on the role of coach of your own team with Pro Basketball Manager 2019. Start your career as head of the team of your choice and lead your players to victory!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+, 32 or 64bits Processor: Intel Pentium 4, Intel Core or AMD Athlon â€“ 2.2 GHz +, SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: Windows XP & Vista are not supported, Minimum resolution : 1024 * 768
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 700 series or similar DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
